title: Reaching out: a story about mainstreaming
creator_credit: John Cosgrove, Terry Dunn, Walt Disney Productions and Educational Media
brief_description: Looks at the difficulties and rewards of integrating the handicapped into regular classrooms. Shows Mary, a severely deaf child with limited speech capabilities and cerebral palsy, and how she copes with mainstreaming.
